name: Sneak 'em Up
description:
This game was made for The Dream Arcade Archive contest.

https://itch.io/jam/dream-arcade-archive/entries

Things are never as they seem, often the first impression can be a little messy or confusing.

A ninja who escapes from soldiers can easily be a hallucination of a schizophrenic guy, who escaped from doctors inside an asylum.

In this arcade, the point of view and the conception of good and bad, is reversed inexorably.

Who will be right? But above all, how long can you resist without getting caught by the doctors?

Instructions:

Kill the enemies silently from behind.

Be careful to never get caught.

Try to escape, if you can.

But never stop running.

WINDOWS

1. Download the file

2. Unzip

3. Run the .exe file

Controls:

WASD  - movement

SPACEBAR - attack

E - special attack

This game was made in 5 days for The Dream Arcade Archive contest.

Developed with Godot Engine.

https://itch.io/jam/dream-arcade-archive/entries

Credits:

Programming and direction

Lorenzo Spoglia  - "Lorespo"

Graphic and Character design

Martina Grillanti (https://dribbble.com/martinagrillanti)

Music
